textAfterTable: Dining Cheers RestaurantAttractive, open restaurant located off main lobby of Hotel featuring an impressive a la carte menu, breakfast and lunch buffet Monday to Friday; and nightly specials. Non-smoking.Daily restaurant hours are: 6:30 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. and 5:00 p.m. to 10:00 p.m. Holiday hours may varyReservations are recommended for groups over sixRed Fox PubJoin us in the Red Fox Pub for your well deserved break, free afternoon or evening recreation. Pub favorites include chicken fingers, fish and chips, dried ribs, quesadillas, spring rolls, onion rings, calamari, nachos or order from our full menu.The Red Fox operates daily from 11:00 a.m. to midnight. Holiday hours may vary. Monday to Friday lunch buffet available from 11:30 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. Happy Hour Prices (beer hi-balls and wine) Monday to Friday from 2:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. and Weekends all day!Room ServiceFor your private dining convenience, choose from our in-room menu as offered in the Cheers Restaurant (excludes buffets). Selections available daily from 7:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m.; limited menu after 10:00 p.m. Affiliations American Bus Association Canadian Business Travel Association Calgary Hotel Association Chamber of Commerce Canadian Society of Association Executives National Tour Association Meeting Rooms Room Name Area Length Width
